about_the_game:
What kind of shenanigans do Aques and Drulger get up to? Find out (or don't) with Fairy Set 2!

Includes the following fairies:
• Aques
• Drulger

*These fairies can't be used for Godly Revival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Shader v5 or newer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Shader v5 or newer
